code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={isCartOpen:false,cartItems:[]};var cartSlice=createSlice({name:'cart',initialState:initialState,reducers:{toggleCart:function toggleCart(state,action){state.isCartOpen=action.payload;},addItem:function addItem(state,action){var newItemId=action.payload.id;var existingItem=state.cartItems.find(function(item){return item.id===newItemId;});if(existingItem){existingItem.quantity++;}else{state.cartItems.push(action.payload);}},removeItem:function removeItem(state,action){state.cartItems=state.cartItems.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});},incrementItem:function incrementItem(state,action){state.cartItems=state.cartItems.map(function(item){if(item.id===action.payload){item.quantity++;}return item;});},decrementItem:function decrementItem(state,action){state.cartItems=state.cartItems.map(function(item){if(item.id===action.payload){item.quantity--;}return item;}).filter(function(item){return item.quantity!==0;});}}});var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,toggleCart=_cartSlice$actions.toggleCart,addItem=_cartSlice$actions.addItem,removeItem=_cartSlice$actions.removeItem,incrementItem=_cartSlice$actions.incrementItem,decrementItem=_cartSlice$actions.decrementItem;export{toggleCart,addItem,removeItem,incrementItem,decrementItem};export default cartSlice.reducer;
